title: VOX DANTE
description: A thrilling Coming-of-Age fantasy adventure, told from the journal of a 12 year old boy. Dante is just an ordinary preteen living in his small southern town of Pecca Sanctuary. He received a journal, and an assignment to document his life for a grade. His journal soon reveals, that this small towns' problems, are anything but small. Heavily inspired by writings of J.K Rowling and Stephen King.
author: Malcolm W.W
